Reviews.Title: Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: EDNA LEWIS
Reviews.Content: love this camera!! does everything it says it will I used it for a birthday party then my niece borrowed and hasn't given it back yet so it is a hit.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.31MP 1/2.33" BSI CMOS Sensor with 25-125mm f/2.5-6.3 Lens
3.31" AMOLED Flip-Out Touchscreen
Full HD 1920 x 1080 30p Video
Gesture Shot for Self-Portraiture and Advanced In-Camera Photo Editing
Integrated Wireless Capabilities and Social Media Sharing and Auto Backup
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung MV900F Multiview Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera in White + 8GB Accessory Kit
